detail_desc: Ballet pumps with a strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Height of soles 0.3 cm.
Ballet pumps with a strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Height of soles 0.3 cm.

Long, warm-lined jacket in washed cotton denim with a faux shearling collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap front pockets with a button, an open chest pocket and side pockets. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Short, fitted dress in a crisp cotton weave with a concealed zip at the back, billowing flounces over the shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.
Cold shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves. Double-layered flounce at the top and narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers in glittery imitation leather with a lightly padded edge, elasticated lacing at the front, toning heel caps and a small loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.

Short blouse in a crinkled, patterned weave with a deep neckline and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the hems, and a seam at the hem that is elasticated at the back.
Top in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.

Short, wide blouse in a crinkled weave with a deep neckline and small opening with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a gathered seam with a broderie anglaise, scalloped flounce at the hem.
Bucket hat in soft, felted wool. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Bucket hat in soft, felted wool. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester. Chunky patterned soles.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester. Chunky patterned soles.

Shoulder bag in nylon with imitation leather piping, a zip at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap with a plastic buckle. One zipped outer compartment and one small inner compartment. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Width 16 cm. Height 22 cm.
Narrow metal Alice band decorated with faceted plastic beads and metal ball chain.
Metal hair grips in various designs decorated with plastic beads and glass rhinestones.
Alice band covered in braided plastic straw with a knot on top.
Hair clips in metal decorated with plastic beads.
Blouse in airy, crinkled voile made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Round opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and short, puff sleeves with elasticated hems.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an elastic bow at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and scalloped insoles in satin made from recycled polyester.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an elastic bow at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and scalloped insoles in satin made from recycled polyester.

Calf-length kaftan woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke that continues down the sleeves, pleats at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Treggings in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one pair with an all-over print. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and bottom. V-neck, short puff sleeves with concealed elastication, a seam at the waist and a draped skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.

Cropped top in jersey crêpe with gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect. Square neckline and short puff sleeves with covered elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Lined.

Ballet pumps in shimmering metallic imitation leather with a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Brogues in imitation leather with a decorative welt seam around the soles, a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and patterned soles. Height of soles 1.7 cm.
Rectangular sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Calf-length dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, patch front pockets and large, side-opening chest pockets. Covered elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Longer cardigan in an airy pattern knit. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. No fasteners.

Short, A-line dress in washed cotton denim. Opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and gathered seams in the skirt. Unlined.

Short-sleeved playsuit in a Tencel™ lyocell weave. Notch lapels, a yoke at the back and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbed hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbed hems.

Boiler suit in washed cotton denim with a detachable tie belt. Collar, buttons to the waist, a yoke at the back and covered elastication at the back of the waist. Flap chest pockets, front pockets, back pockets and straight legs. The cotton content of the boiler suit is partly recycled.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a round, gathered neckline and V-shaped opening with a hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the elbows. Detachable tie belt at the waist with tassels at the ends. Asymmetric seam around the skirt. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the front with a wide flounce trim that continues over the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in soft, washed cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a chest pocket. Relaxed fit with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long, straight-cut shirt in an airy linen and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with a tab and button, and slits in the sides of the hem.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with side pockets, fake welt back pockets, a fake fly with a button and gently tapered legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with side pockets, fake welt back pockets, a fake fly with a button and gently tapered legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Soft, non-wired bras in jersey made from a cotton blend with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies. Diameter 4 cm.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies. Diameter 4 cm.

Short, wide dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, small opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and a frill trim around the armhole seams. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems and a low-cut skirt with gathers to create volume and soft draping.

Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with long sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides.

Fitted dress in stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a short skirt. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Hairband in denim-look woven fabric with a knot detail at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.
Hair clip with a large satin bow decorated with plastic beads and sparkly stones.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and flap leg pockets with a tab and D-rings. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a square neckline and double-layered, elbow-length puff sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
